title: “We Fight for this New World Order”
author: VD
content_html:
“It is a critical time because we fight for this New World, we fight for this New World Order. We are protecting not only Ukraine but all the other countries.”

Kira Rudik, Member of Parliament, Ukraine

Yes, we know, Kira. You’re a paid globalist whore, just like all the others shrieking and self-mutilating and calling out to Baphomet. That’s why we hope, and we pray, that Russia, and China, and every other nation that seeks to survive as a sovereign nation, is completely and utterly successful in their war against your evil New World Order.

If you listen closely enough, Satan’s little servants always tell you what they’re doing.

DISCUSS ON SG
